examples: He elevated many of his friends to powerful positions within the government.
Elevó a muchos de sus amigos a posiciones poderosas dentro del gobierno.
It was an attempt to elevate football to a subject worthy of serious study.
Fue un intento de elevar el fútbol a un tema digno de un estudio serio.
He has elevated bad taste into an art form.
Ha elevado el mal gusto a una forma de arte.
It is important that the injured leg should be elevated.
Es importante que la pierna lesionada esté elevada.
